resources.string: As a teacher, you can use EduX to share your knowledge and expertise with students who are eager to learn.
Welcome to EduX, the ultimate learning platform for students in Sri Lanka! Here, you can access free courses and borrow books from generous donors who want to help you succeed.
As a donor, you can use EduX to give back to your community by sharing your unused books with students who need them
